TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get something you have no name for, which happens to be a velociraptor-bear crossbreed.

I wish for a good movie

Granted, it's so good you volunteer to do a stunt from the movie and die.

I wish for more Coinz.

granted. the Coinz turned out to be gigantic and result in you being crushed

i wish for Nicholas Cage to be less scary

Granted. He's ugly. Everyone blames you for it, and the slaughter you with chainsaws.

I wish for the next poster to turn into a duck right after saying "Granted, but-"

Granted. It's not me, because I didn't say 'Granted, bu --'... quack.

I wish that my current mission to Jool succeeds.

Granted. The Kerbals are sucked into the planet at your command, for SCIENCE!

I wish she didn't blind me with science.

Granted, she blinds you with magic.

I wish for more reputation tag-things.

Granted. Your reputation sinks to bellow -64576577588765435436658678e+=342.

(roblox noob mode activated) GIVE ME MAI SODAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!1111!!!!!!1lol rofl 1337 LOLOLOLOLOLOLOL I R L33T!!!!!!!

Granted roblox never exists I hate that game

I wish for a super computer

Granted, but it has a crappy graphics card, making it impossible to play any high-end games.

I wish for Dream Chaser to be finished.

The Dream Chaser devs announce they are ending development and moving on to other things, and Dream Chaser as it stands now is released as "finished", an unplayable buggy mess.

I wish for a sunny day tomorrow

Granted, but it won't be sunny where you live.

I wish for money.

[]

Edited August 2, 2019 by CvVtjRtb

Granted. You are sliced up by the edge of a mirror.

I wish for a clever corruption.

Granted, but it lost in the co-110001101101100111010100111

I wish the next poster looked into the operational end of the device

Granted, but the "device" happened to be a contact lens, so that's pretty standard, really.

I wish I had a better internet connection.

Granted, but the "device" happened to be a contact lens, so that's pretty standard, really.

I wish I had a better internet connection.

Granted, but you can only acess rule 34.

(Man, that was mean!)

I wish i had more ability with planes.

Granted, you now have the ability to set them on fire and have them explode by being anywhere near them, this ability is involontarie

I wish apon a star.

Granted, 10 km away, congrats you're dead!

I wish the week would be: sunday, saturday, sunday, saturday, sunday, monday, friday

Granted, 10 km away, congrats you're dead!

I wish the week would be: sunday, saturday, sunday, saturday, sunday, monday, friday

Granted, but Earth's rotation was slowed and now mondays last 30 hours.

I wish i had sunglasses.

Granted, you got sunglasses made of cancer causing material.

I wish my friends would know how to play KSP.

Granted but you cant see out of them, and you stumble into the street during rush hour and are ran over 25 times and die.

I wish there were airliner parts in KSP.

Granted. You try to download B9 Aerospace, but your computer is reduced to slag because of the file size.

I wish for the ASAS to do something.

Granted. It stops working.

I wish I had a positive amount of money equal to or greater than 1,000,000 USD.

Granted. Good luck spending that on the Moon.

I wish for words.
